weapon.name: Icewind Arrow
weapon.description: The arrows from this bow carry the power of frost.

normals.name: Quickdraw
normals.description:
While on the ground, draw the bow repeatedly to attack **5** times.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **53.7%** of ATK plus **322**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **48.1%** of ATK plus **288**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **86.5%** of ATK plus **519**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **133.3%** of ATK plus **800**.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **123.8%** of ATK plus **743** and knock the target back a short distance.

normals.name: Charged Arrow
normals.description: Tap and hold normal attack to charge an attack. Deal base damage equal to **96.6%** of ATK plus **580**, and **50%** more for each **1** second spent charging, up to **3** seconds. Deal double damage when scoring a headshot or when hitting an enemy's weak point, and knock the target down (headshots are ineffective against Wanderers).

normals.name: Arrow Rain
normals.description: After any normal attack, hold the normal attack button to unleash Arrow Rain, dealing up to **315.9%** of ATK plus **1895** area damage to targets.

normals.name: Air Volley
normals.description:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack **4** times in a row in the air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **61.9%** of ATK plus **372**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **81.4%** of ATK plus **488**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **124%** of ATK plus **744**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **186.8%** of ATK plus **1121**.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: **15** seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for **0.5** seconds.

dodge.name: Loaded Arrow
dodge.description: Tap attack after dodging to trigger a Loaded Arrow, which **knocks the target back** and deals damage equal to **136.4%** of ATK plus **818**.

skill.name: Piercing Shot
skill.description: Perform a backflip and fire **3** piercing shots, with the main shot dealing damage equal to **284.1%** of ATK plus **1705**, and the other two shots deal **60%** damage. In addition, **knock targets back** and stun them for **5** seconds if they collide with an obstacle. Cooldown: **12** seconds.

discharge.name: Explosive Barrage
discharge.description: When **weapon charge** is full or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer**, and create a hailstorm at the target location, dealing damage equal to **655.5%** of ATK plus **3933**. The storm has a **10%** chance to **strongly freeze** the target for **2** seconds. Gain cold front, and increase speed by **45%** for **7** seconds.

advancements.description: Grant a stack of Sharp Arrow each time the arrow fired by a Dodge attack hits a target. Each stack increases damage by **5%** for **15** seconds. Stack up to **3** times.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.
Launching a Dodge attack fires **3** Charged Arrows.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.
Double duration of Arrow Rain and slow targets by **25%**.
Sharp Arrow stacks up to **5** times. Hitting a target with a Charged Arrow immediately grants **3** stacks. Headshots grant **5** stacks.

matrice.name: Tsubasa
matrice.description: "The wind blows." That sums up every cause for leaving and setting off again.

set.set_2: Increase damage dealt by **14%**/**16%**/**18%**/**20%** when there are no enemies within **4** meters.
set.set_4: Upon a headshot or hitting the target with Icewind Arrow: Piercing Shot, increase ATK by **15%**/**18%**/**21%**/**25%** for **8** seconds.
